articles.author: Chris Liakos, Laura Smith-Spark and Isil Sariyuce, CNN
articles.title: Brutal heatwave scorches southern Europe as continent's summer of extreme weather rages on - CNN
articles.description: Extreme heat and wildfires continued to plague parts of southern Europe on Wednesday, a day after the top temperature in Greece reached 47.1 degrees Celsius (117 degrees Fahrenheit) -- just shy of the highest ever recorded in Europe.
